document_data.name: Bresmer
document_data.mainbody: '''Bresmer''' was a seneschal of [[Langalos]] during the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He murmured more than he talked.
document_data.Relationships: He served under High Duke [[Horostos]] of Langalos.
document_data.History: Bresmer reported to High Duke Horostos after the death of the [[adventurer]]s of the [[Frostfire Banner]], who had been seeking [[Saeraede Lyonora|the Slayer]] in [[the Dead Place]] just west of [[Starmantle]], that one of their [[horse]]s had been found washed up in the river. He then reported, to the duke's displeasure, that no one in [[Reth]] or [[Westgate]] was forthcoming to take on the assignment to find the mysterious Slayer. And then, to even more of the duke's displeasure, he reported the [[Harpers]] had taken an interest in the matter, and would be reporting to him before the end of the season. He then helped the Duke come to terms with the fact he was in a bad situation and the best he could do was wait.
